## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Schema change (changes to Zod or Prisma schemas)

## Schema Impact

<!-- If this PR changes the canonical schema or database schema, describe the impact -->

- [ ] No schema changes
- [ ] Zod schema changes (backward compatible)
- [ ] Zod schema changes (breaking - requires version bump)
- [ ] Prisma schema changes (requires migration)
